text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Strix III Hero G731GV-DB74 17.3" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix III Hero G731GV-DB74 17.3" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix III Hero G731GV-DB74 17.3" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the ASUS ROG Strix III Hero G731GV-DB74 17.3" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Strix III Hero G731GV-DB74 17.3" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!
